verses.verse: וּכְכַלּ֣וֹת <WH3615> Now when these things were done אֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> these נִגְּשׁ֨וּ <WH5066> came אֵלַ֤י <WH413> about הַשָּׂרִים֙ <WH8269> the princes לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> to me saying לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not נִבְדְּל֞וּ <WH914> have not separated הָעָ֤ם <WH5971> The people יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel וְהַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <WH3548> and the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> and the Levites מֵעַמֵּ֖י <WH5971> themselves from the people הָאֲרָצ֑וֹת <WH776> of the lands כְּ֠תוֹעֲבֹֽתֵיהֶם <WH8441> [doing] according to their abominations לַכְּנַעֲנִ֨י <WH3669> [even] of the Canaanites הַחִתִּ֜י <WH2850> the Hittites הַפְּרִזִּ֣י <WH6522> the Perizzites הַיְבוּסִ֗י <WH2983> the Jebusites הָֽעַמֹּנִי֙ <WH5984> the Ammonites הַמֹּ֣אָבִ֔י <WH4125> the Moabites הַמִּצְרִ֖י <WH4713> the Egyptians וְהָאֱמֹרִֽי׃ <WH567> and the Amorites

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נָשְׂא֣וּ <WH5375> For they have taken מִבְּנֹֽתֵיהֶ֗ם <WH1323> of their daughters לָהֶם֙ <WH1992> and for וְלִבְנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH1121> for themselves and for their sons וְהִתְעָֽרְבוּ֙ <WH6148> have mingled זֶ֣רַע <WH2233> seed הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> so that the holy בְּעַמֵּ֖י <WH5971> themselves with the people הָאֲרָצ֑וֹת <WH776> of [those] lands וְיַ֧ד <WH3027> yea the hand הַשָּׂרִ֣ים <WH8269> of the princes וְהַסְּגָנִ֗ים <WH5461> and rulers הָ֥יְתָ֛ה <WH1961> have been בַּמַּ֥עַל <WH4604> in this trespass הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this רִאשׁוֹנָֽה׃ <WH7223> hath been chief ס

וּכְשָׁמְעִי֙ <WH8085> And when I heard אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this קָרַ֥עְתִּי <WH7167> I rent אֶת־ <WH853> בִּגְדִ֖י <WH899> my garment וּמְעִילִ֑י <WH4598> and my mantle וָאֶמְרְטָ֞ה <WH4803> and plucked off מִשְּׂעַ֤ר <WH8181> the hair רֹאשִׁי֙ <WH7218> of my head וּזְקָנִ֔י <WH2206> and of my beard וָאֵשְׁבָ֖ה <WH3427> and sat down מְשׁוֹמֵֽם׃ <WH8074> astonied

וְאֵלַ֣י <WH413> about יֵאָסְפ֗וּ <WH622> Then were assembled כֹּ֤ל <WH3605> everyone חָרֵד֙ <WH2730> unto me every one that trembled בְּדִבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> at the words אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <WH430> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel עַ֖ל <WH5921> account מַ֣עַל <WH4604> because of the transgression הַגּוֹלָ֑ה <WH1473> of those that had been carried away וַאֲנִי֙ <WH589> I יֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> and I sat מְשׁוֹמֵ֔ם <WH8074> astonied עַ֖ד <WH5704> until לְמִנְחַ֥ת <WH4503> sacrifice הָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> until the evening

וּבְמִנְחַ֣ת <WH4503> sacrifice הָעֶ֗רֶב <WH6153> And at the evening קַ֚מְתִּי <WH6965> I arose up מִתַּֽעֲנִיתִ֔י <WH8589> from my heaviness וּבְקָרְעִ֥י <WH7167> and having rent בִגְדִ֖י <WH899> my garment וּמְעִילִ֑י <WH4598> and my mantle וָֽאֶכְרְעָה֙ <WH3766> I fell עַל־ <WH5921> on בִּרְכַּ֔י <WH1290> upon my knees וָאֶפְרְשָׂ֥ה <WH6566> and spread out כַפַּ֖י <WH3709> my hands אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> my God

וָאֹמְרָ֗ה <WH559> And said אֱלֹהַי֙ <WH430> O my God בֹּ֣שְׁתִּי <WH954> I am ashamed וְנִכְלַ֔מְתִּי <WH3637> and blush לְהָרִ֧ים <WH7311> to lift up אֱלֹהַ֛י <WH430> to thee my God פָּנַ֖י <WH6440> my face אֵלֶ֑יךָ <WH413> about כִּ֣י <WH3588> for עֲוֹנֹתֵ֤ינוּ <WH5771> for our iniquities רָבוּ֙ <WH7235> are increased לְמַ֣עְלָה <WH4605> over רֹּ֔אשׁ <WH7218> [our] head וְאַשְׁמָתֵ֥נוּ <WH819> and our trespass גָדְלָ֖ה <WH1431> is grown up עַ֥ד <WH5704> even לַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> unto the heavens

מִימֵ֣י <WH3117> Since the days אֲבֹתֵ֗ינוּ <WH1> of our fathers אֲנַ֙חְנוּ֙ <WH587> we בְּאַשְׁמָ֣ה <WH819> trespass גְדֹלָ֔ה <WH1419> [have] we [been] in a great עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> to this וּבַעֲוֹנֹתֵ֡ינוּ <WH5771> and for our iniquities נִתַּ֡נּוּ <WH5414> been delivered אֲנַחְנוּ֩ <WH587> we מְלָכֵ֨ינוּ <WH4428> have we our kings כֹהֲנֵ֜ינוּ <WH3548> [and] our priests בְּיַ֣ד ׀ <WH3027> into the hand מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> of the kings הָאֲרָצ֗וֹת <WH776> of the lands בַּחֶ֜רֶב <WH2719> to the sword בַּשְּׁבִ֧י <WH7628> to captivity וּבַבִּזָּ֛ה <WH961> and to a spoil וּבְבֹ֥שֶׁת <WH1322> and to confusion פָּנִ֖ים <WH6440> of face כְּהַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> as [it is] this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וְעַתָּ֡ה <WH6258> now כִּמְעַט־ <WH4592> And now for a little רֶגַע֩ <WH7281> space הָיְתָ֨ה <WH1961> has been תְחִנָּ֜ה <WH8467> grace מֵאֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> our God לְהַשְׁאִ֥יר <WH7604> to leave לָ֙נוּ֙ פְּלֵיטָ֔ה <WH6413> us a remnant to escape וְלָתֶת־ <WH5414> and to give לָ֥נוּ יָתֵ֖ד <WH3489> us a nail בִּמְק֣וֹם <WH4725> place קָדְשׁ֑וֹ <WH6944> in his holy לְהָאִ֤יר <WH215> may lighten עֵינֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH5869> our eyes אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> that our God וּלְתִתֵּ֛נוּ <WH5414> and give מִֽחְיָ֥ה <WH4241> reviving מְעַ֖ט <WH4592> us a little בְּעַבְדֻתֵֽנוּ׃ <WH5659> in our bondage

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עֲבָדִ֣ים <WH5650> For we [were] bondmen אֲנַ֔חְנוּ <WH587> ourselves וּבְעַבְדֻתֵ֔נוּ <WH5659> us in our bondage לֹ֥א <WH3808> has not עֲזָבָ֖נוּ <WH5800> hath not forsaken אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> yet our God וַֽיַּט־ <WH5186> but hath extended עָלֵ֣ינוּ <WH5921> and חֶ֡סֶד <WH2617> mercy לִפְנֵי֩ <WH6440> unto us in the sight מַלְכֵ֨י <WH4428> of the kings פָרַ֜ס <WH6539> of Persia לָֽתֶת־ <WH5414> to give לָ֣נוּ מִֽחְיָ֗ה <WH4241> us a reviving לְרוֹמֵ֞ם <WH7311> to set up אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> the house אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH430> of our God וּלְהַעֲמִ֣יד <WH5975> and to repair אֶת־ <WH853> חָרְבֹתָ֔יו <WH2723> the desolations וְלָֽתֶת־ <WH5414> thereof and to give לָ֣נוּ גָדֵ֔ר <WH1447> us a wall בִּֽיהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> in Judah וּבִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> and in Jerusalem ס

וְעַתָּ֛ה <WH6258> Now מַה־ <WH4100> what נֹּאמַ֥ר <WH559> what shall we say אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <WH430> And now O our God אַֽחֲרֵי־ <WH310> after זֹ֑את <WH2063> likewise כִּ֥י <WH3588> for עָזַ֖בְנוּ <WH5800> this? for we have forsaken מִצְוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH4687> thy commandments

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which צִוִּ֗יתָ <WH6680> Which thou hast commanded בְּיַ֨ד <WH3027> by עֲבָדֶ֣יךָ <WH5650> thy servants הַנְּבִיאִים֮ <WH5030> the prophets לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> saying הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> The land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which אַתֶּ֤ם <WH859> you בָּאִים֙ <WH935> unto which ye go לְרִשְׁתָּ֔הּ <WH3423> to possess אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> land נִדָּה֙ <WH5079> it is an unclean הִ֔יא <WH1931> he בְּנִדַּ֖ת <WH5079> with the filthiness עַמֵּ֣י <WH5971> of the people הָאֲרָצ֑וֹת <WH776> of the lands בְּתוֹעֲבֹֽתֵיהֶ֗ם <WH8441> with their abominations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which מִלְא֛וּהָ <WH4390> which have filled מִפֶּ֥ה <WH6310> it from one end אֶל־ <WH413> to פֶּ֖ה <WH6310> to another בְּטֻמְאָתָֽם׃ <WH2932> with their uncleanness

וְ֠עַתָּה <WH6258> now בְּֽנוֹתֵיכֶ֞ם <WH1323> not your daughters אַל־ <WH408> nor תִּתְּנ֣וּ <WH5414> Now therefore give לִבְנֵיהֶ֗ם <WH1121> unto their sons וּבְנֹֽתֵיהֶם֙ <WH1323> their daughters אַל־ <WH408> nor תִּשְׂא֣וּ <WH5375> neither take לִבְנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1121> unto your sons וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and never תִדְרְשׁ֧וּ <WH1875> nor seek שְׁלֹמָ֛ם <WH7965> their peace וְטוֹבָתָ֖ם <WH2896> or their wealth עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> ever לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> that תֶּחֶזְק֗וּ <WH2388> that ye may be strong וַאֲכַלְתֶּם֙ <WH398> and eat אֶת־ <WH853> ט֣וּב <WH2898> the good הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land וְהוֹרַשְׁתֶּ֥ם <WH3423> and leave [it] for an inheritance לִבְנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1121> to your children עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> for ever

וְאַֽחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> And after כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַבָּ֣א <WH935> all that is come עָלֵ֔ינוּ <WH5921> and בְּמַעֲשֵׂ֙ינוּ֙ <WH4639> deeds הָרָעִ֔ים <WH7451> upon us for our evil וּבְאַשְׁמָתֵ֖נוּ <WH819> trespass הַגְּדֹלָ֑ה <WH1419> and for our great כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> since אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> You אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> seeing that thou our God חָשַׂ֤כְתָּֽ <WH2820> hast punished לְמַ֙טָּה֙ <WH4295> us less מֵֽעֲוֹנֵ֔נוּ <WH5771> than our iniquities וְנָתַ֥תָּה <WH5414> [deserve] and hast given לָּ֛נוּ פְּלֵיטָ֖ה <WH6413> us [such] deliverance כָּזֹֽאת׃ <WH2063> shall we

הֲנָשׁוּב֙ <WH7725> Should we again לְהָפֵ֣ר <WH6565> break מִצְוֹתֶ֔יךָ <WH4687> thy commandments וּ֨לְהִתְחַתֵּ֔ן <WH2859> and join in affinity בְּעַמֵּ֥י <WH5971> with the people הַתֹּעֵב֖וֹת <WH8441> Tolaites הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these הֲל֤וֹא <WH3808> not תֶֽאֱנַף־ <WH599> be angry בָּ֙נוּ֙ עַד־ <WH5704> to the point כַּלֵּ֔ה <WH3615> with us till thou hadst consumed לְאֵ֥ין <WH369> there שְׁאֵרִ֖ית <WH7611> [us] so that [there should be] no remnant וּפְלֵיטָֽה׃ <WH6413> deliverance פ

יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel צַדִּ֣יק <WH6662> thou [art] righteous אַ֔תָּה <WH859> you כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נִשְׁאַ֥רְנוּ <WH7604> for we remain פְלֵיטָ֖ה <WH6413> yet escaped כְּהַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> as [it is] this day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this הִנְנ֤וּ <WH2005> behold לְפָנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH6440> behold we [are] before בְּאַשְׁמָתֵ֔ינוּ <WH819> thee in our trespasses כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֵ֥ין <WH369> no לַעֲמ֛וֹד <WH5975> for we cannot stand לְפָנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> before עַל־ <WH5921> because זֹֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise פ
